critter.name: Pondskater
critter.desc: Do you know how pondskaters keep themselves above water, wot? The oil on the hairs of their feet repel water! Thusly they stay afloat. Which begs the question, if one were to shave their feet, would they sink? I daresay, I cannot think of a worse job than being the shaver of insect feet.
critter.quote: I caught a pondskater! Wonder if it can do a pond ollie...
